value.name: Carmelo Anthony: If Detroit Pistons draft me, I would have won two or three NBA titles
value.description: It's arguable the greatest "what if" in Detroit sports history. What would have happened if the Detroit Pistons draft Carmelo Anthony?

video.name: Carmelo Anthony: If Detroit Pistons draft me, I would have won two or three NBA titles

value.name: Chauncey Billups: Pistons 'Would've Won 3 Championships' with Carmelo Anthony
value.description: Chauncey Billups agrees with Carmelo Anthony that the Detroit Pistons could have had a dynasty if they made a better choice in the 2003 NBA draft. "If [Detroit] got Melo, we would've won three championships," Billups said Tuesday on Bart & Hahn. It comes after Anthony projected he would have "two or three rings" if he went to Detroit during ...

video.name: Chauncey Billups: Pistons 'Would've Won 3 Championships' with Carmelo Anthony

value.name: Greatest Red Wings who never won a Stanley Cup in Detroit
value.description: This week, MLive is ranking the best players for the Tigers, Red Wings, Pistons and Lions to never win a title during their time in Detroit. Friday, we will rank the top 10 from all four sports combined. Here is a look at the 20 most notable Red Wings who never won a Cup in Detroit. This includes only players who played multiple seasons with ...

value.name: 5 Ways The Detroit Pistons Got Lucky This Season
value.description: The Detroit Pistons entered the coronavirus-induced hiatus with a woeful 20-46 record. That seems bad but in a sense, the Pistons couldn't have gotten luckier in a few vital ways.

value.name: Carmelo Anthony: 'I would've had two, maybe three rings' if drafted by Pistons
value.description: After a dominant freshman season at Syracuse during which Carmelo Anthony led his team to the national title, many expected the Pistons to take him second overall after LeBron James at No. 1. That didn't happen.

value.name: ESPN report details how Pistons, Dwane Casey handled NBA shutdown
value.description: The Detroit Pistons have cleared quarantine and details have emerged about how the team and head coach Dwane Casey responded as the league shut down. In an interview with Jackie MacMullen of ESPN, Casey shared his account of the moments leading up to the NBA’s suspension, how his players responded to the uncertainty they were facing and how ...

value.name: Carmelo Anthony says he would have won 'two or three rings' if Pistons picked him in 2003 NBA Draft
value.description: Instead of getting selected by Detroit with the No. 2 pick, Anthony got drafted third overall by the Denver Nuggets

value.name: Are The Detroit Pistons At A Disadvantage With No Pre-Draft Process?
value.description: In a crisis, the best tend to rise to the occasion. We don't yet know where the Detroit Pistons front office stands among the best organizations, but we'll find out a great deal based on how they fare in a draft with no pre-draft process.

value.name: Despite pandemic, Pistons move forward with draft preparations
value.description: Despite pandemic, Pistons move forward with draft preparations With the NCAAs canceled and player combine in limbo, the Pistons like other NBA teams are evaluating prospects on video. Check out this story on detroitnews.com: https://www.detroitnews.com/story/sports/nba/pistons/2020/03/28/pandemic-throws-wrench-into-pistons-draft-preparations ...

value.name: Carmelo Anthony: I would have won two or three NBA titles if Pistons had drafted me
value.description: It's arguable the greatest "what if" in Detroit sports history. What would have happened if the Detroit Pistons had drafted Carmelo Anthony?
